pkgmetadata.longdescription: The GBNP package provides algorithms for computing Grobner bases of noncommutative polynomials with coefficients from a field implemented in GAP and with respect to the "total degree first then lexicographical" ordering. Further provided are some variations, such as a weighted and truncated version and a tracing facility. The word "algorithm" is to be interpreted loosely here: in general one cannot expect such an algorithm to terminate, as it would imply solvability of the word problem for finitely presented (semi)groups.
